channel.title: Creepiest thing ever
channel.description:
Yea, so pretty much I woke up this morning and found a piece of paper over my face and my earphones just underneath my neck where i was sleeping. It's not so much that this is the first time anything like this happened to me, it's just that I've been feeling absolutely terrified for some unknown reason before i go to bed. It's kinda creeping me out because I am slightly psychic (I'm gonna get flamed for that), and I've been seeing weird shadows and figures recently.
So has anything similar to this ever happen to you? Because I feel like the only one right now :|

item.title: Creepiest thing ever
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

I believe all humans have this ‘physic’ subliminal powers. I very highly doubt that you making these predictions were psychic. Think about it, your aunt either had twins or didn’t, your sister’s boyfriend either got hit by a car or didn’t. All these chances were 50/50. Try comparing the times you predicted RIGHT compared to predicting wrong.

If you believe you are having visions, i would highly recommend writing them down to a journal and revisit them when you believe something strange has happened. Also, these ‘visions’ or ‘predictions’ could just be a re collation of a past time, similar memory you are having. If you do decide to keep a journal, log everything and anything that you believe to be adjust to your supernatural powers.

As to detecting the Aura of other people, I would say that this is just the act of you subconscious once again.

Also, i would definitely take what Frell said to consideration.

Read full topic
